Message: The user completes the submission of the form

Hi, our ads got rejected for Violation of Advertising policy  because of using celebrities. We already provided endorsement before (not me personally but a colleague provided it. Can you manually look this up so our ads can run?

I understand your concern about the ad rejection due to the use of celebrities. Unfortunately, I can't manually look up endorsements or make changes to ad status. However, you can appeal the rejection decision by emailing adsupport@newsbreak.com with details of the endorsement and any supporting documents. Make sure to review our Ad Policy and Guidelines to ensure compliance before resubmitting your ad. You can find more information here: [Ad Policy](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/25362604231053-Ad-Policy).
